title: 5-Minute Morning Meditation for Recovery
speaker: Maya Patel, Certified Meditation Teacher
description: Start your day with intention and clarity through this guided morning meditation designed specifically for those in recovery.
summary: A calming way to begin each day with purpose and peace.

title: Understanding Addiction: A Scientific Perspective
speaker: Dr. James Wilson, Addiction Medicine Specialist
description: An educational video explaining the biological and psychological aspects of addiction, offering hope through scientific understanding.
summary: Learn how addiction affects the brain and why recovery is possible.

title: Breathing Through Cravings: Emergency Coping Technique
speaker: Lisa Garcia, Recovery Coach
description: Learn a powerful breathing technique to help you navigate cravings and intense emotions in real-time.
summary: Master this essential tool for managing difficult moments in recovery.

title: Recovery Story: From Darkness to Light
speaker: Marcus Johnson, 5 Years Sober
description: An inspiring personal story of recovery, sharing the challenges, breakthroughs, and joy of sustained sobriety.
summary: Find hope and inspiration in this authentic recovery journey.

title: Building Healthy Relationships in Recovery
speaker: Dr. Angela Torres, Relationship Therapist
description: Learn how to develop and maintain healthy relationships while protecting your recovery and setting appropriate boundaries.
summary: Navigate relationships with confidence and clarity in recovery.

title: Progressive Muscle Relaxation for Sleep
speaker: David Chen, Sleep Specialist
description: A guided progressive muscle relaxation session to help you achieve better sleep quality, crucial for recovery.
summary: Improve your sleep with this calming bedtime practice.

title: Mindful Walking Meditation
speaker: Sarah Lee, Mindfulness Instructor
description: Discover how to turn a simple walk into a mindful meditation practice that you can do anywhere, anytime.
summary: Transform everyday movement into a healing practice.

title: Gratitude Practice for Recovery
speaker: Elena Rodriguez, Recovery Specialist
description: Learn how cultivating gratitude can transform your recovery experience and improve overall well-being.
summary: Harness the power of gratitude for lasting positive change.
